name: 蘇評揮
objective:
Technology Introduction and System Design of an Autonomous Electric Vehicle are the focus contents, and which will be included as follows.
1. Technological Trend and Industrial Practice: ACE mobility on demand; Automation, Connection, and Electrification made Google, Tesla, and Uber driving the future of Automotive Industry.  
2. System Design: Scenario drives the innovative business model to develop the new vehicle requirements for an Autonomous Vehicle System design; chassis, powertrain, sensors, communication devices, and infrastructure adoption enabling technologies.
Key Components:
 Automation: Radar, Lidar, EPS, AEB, CPU, and SI,
 Electrification: Motor, Drive, Battery, ICE, BEV, HEV, FcHEV, and Controls,
 Connectivity: Telcom, DSRC, 4~5G, SLAM, Big Data, and Infrastructure.
3. Case Study and Group Presentation:
Automotive supply chain innovation from manufacturing to solution-based ACE mobility services,
 A few Fleets can be selected for the group studies and for presentation, such as; Elderly community, Campus Shuttle, Tour Hot Spots Shuttle, Industrial Park, and Short Distance e-Taxi.
schedule:
Week 1~3: Technological Trend and Industrial Practice of an ACE mobility on demand. 
Week 4~8: System Design: from Scenario to the new vehicle requirements for an Autonomous Vehicle System design.
Week 9: Mid-term test and group presentation.
Week 10~14:  Key Components Technologies.
Week 15~16: Case Study and Group Theme Consolidation.
Week 17-18: Final Test and Presentation.
scorePolicy:
Mid-term presentation:20%
Mid-term test: 20%
Final presentation: 35%
Final test: 25%
materials: Class notes will be prepared by the Professor and handed it out by PDF bi-weekly.
